channel.title: Comments on: Just Say No?
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/should-i-just-say-no/#comment-141">Dirty Girl</a>.
Serendipity indeed! I think the path is different for everybody; it's just good to know that we're not in the woods alone.
I apologise for the delay in my reply, I've been travelling.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dirty Girl.

Serendipity indeed! I think the path is different for everybody; it’s just good to know that we’re not in the woods alone.

I apologise for the delay in my reply, I’ve been travelling.

item.title: By: Dirty Girl
item.dc:creator: Dirty Girl
item.description:
RE your comment on my blog and this series. Aftercare for myself isn't something I've thought of when dealing with my issues with my fantasies. I"m not sure about balance yet. Not sure if I can get there the same way. Thanks, good to meet you and congrats on 3 months of blogging and looking forward to reading more. :)
There's some serendipity happening.
item.content:encoded:
RE your comment on my blog and this series. Aftercare for myself isn’t something I’ve thought of when dealing with my issues with my fantasies.
I”m not sure about balance yet. Not sure if I can get there the same way. Thanks, good to meet you and congrats on 3 months of blogging and looking forward to reading more. :)

There’s some serendipity happening.
